name: React
creator: Facebook
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly single-page applications.

name: Angular
creator: Google
description: A platform and framework for building single-page client applications using HTML and TypeScript.

name: Vue.js
creator: Evan You
description: A progressive framework for building user interfaces, designed to be incrementally adoptable.

name: Svelte
creator: Rich Harris
description: A radical new approach to building user interfaces that compiles your code to tiny, framework-less vanilla JS.

name: Next.js
creator: Vercel
description: A React framework that enables server-side rendering and generating static websites.

name: Ember.js
creator: Yehuda Katz
description: A framework for ambitious web developers that provides a complete solution with data management and application structures.
